additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Internet, Telephone, Cable-TV, Satellite, Alarm System, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 There's a new built private house for rent with capital repairs, also with wellorganized central geating, wifi, home phone, furniture, fireplace, air-cooler and all technics in Svaneti's district. In Ecologicaly clean place, from Sabcho's moedani(square) 500metre. Mnatobis st.N12. The house has one reception-room, 1 kitchen, 3 bedroom, 1 Cabinet, 4 bathrooms (2 on first stair and 2 on second stair), 3 balconies, a Mansard and basement with training simulators. Living area without balconies, mansard and basement - 200 kv.m, verandah - 50kv.m, yeard - 190kv.m.
